code:
Title: Attention All Employees! We've Released Another Phishing Email Campaign
Body: This email was sent to all employees at our organization. Please take a moment to review the attached attachment. This is just one of the many phishing emails we've received recently, so please be extra cautious when responding to any suspicious emails.
Attached is a file containing login credentials for our internal network. We suggest you change your passwords to something complex and secure, and report any suspicious activity immediately. Thank you for helping us protect our organization from cyber threats.
Cc: [Insert any relevant list of internal company users]
[Insert your affiliate/network login credentials at
